thread.title: DuPont Fabros Technology, Inc. To Speak At AFCOM Data Center World 2015
thread.title_full: DuPont Fabros Technology, Inc. To Speak At AFCOM Data Center World 2015

author: admin
title: DuPont Fabros Technology, Inc. To Speak At AFCOM Data Center World 2015
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: DuPont Fabros Technology Inc. 
WASHINGTON, Sept. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- DuPont Fabros Technology, Inc. (NYSE: DFT), a leading owner, developer, operator and manager of enterprise-class, carrier-neutral, large multi-tenant wholesale data centers, today announced that Scott Davis, executive vice president, operations, will be speaking at the AFCOM Data Center World Conference being held Sept. 20-23 at the Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center in National Harbor, MD. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20120104/MM29780LOGO 
Davis' session, titled 'Mega Data Centers - The Next Step: Unraveling Industry Trends,' will provide a first look at DuPont Fabros Technology's new mega data center ACC7, which utilizes cost-effective innovation to unravel and address the numerous industry trends facing end users today. A prominent feature of the new design includes a shift from the use of conventional low-voltage Isolated Parallel (I-P) UPS topology to a medium voltage (MV) I-P solution. The presentation will highlight the advantages and challenges of a MV application. DFT will also be exhibiting at booth 618. 
"To speak and exhibit at this event is a great opportunity to discuss major trends in the data center space with some of the industry's top leaders and influencers," said Davis. "We're excited to showcase the numerous innovative design elements and energy efficiencies we introduced in our ACC7 data center in Virginia. We most recently carried these design features forward to our newest data center, CH2, located just outside of Chicago." 
Data Center World is the leading educational conference and expo for data center professionals and is the largest global event of its kind. -- WHO: Scott Davis, executive vice president, operations, DFT -- WHAT: 'Mega Data Centers - The Next Step: Unraveling Industry Trends,' session at the AFCOM Data Center World -- WHERE: Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center, National Harbor; Room: Baltimore 3/4 -- WHEN: Mon., Sept. 21, 11:40 a.m. - 12:40 p.m. 
For more information, or to register, visit http://www.datacenterworld.com/fall/ 
About DuPont Fabros Technology, Inc. DuPont Fabros Technology, Inc. (NYSE: DFT) is a leading owner, developer, operator and manager of enterprise-class, carrier-neutral, large multi-tenant wholesale data centers. The Company's facilities are designed to offer highly specialized, efficient and safe computing environments in a low-cost operating model. The Company's customers outsource their mission-critical applications and include national and international enterprises across numerous industries, such as technology, Internet content providers, media, communications, cloud-based, healthcare and financial services. The Company's 12 data centers are located in four major U.S. markets, which total 2.9 million gross square feet and 256 megawatts of available critical load to power the servers and computing equipment of its customers. DuPont Fabros Technology is a real estate investment trust (REIT) headquartered in Washington, D.C. For more information, please visit www.dft.com 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/dupont-fabros-technology-inc-to-speak-at-afcom-data-center-world-2015-300145723.html 
SOURCE DuPont Fabros Technology Inc.
